pullRequest.body:
These are okay `@[simp]` lemmas in principle but sometimes discharging the hypothesis is very expensive.

This PR adds some extra `@[simp]` lemmas instead; those should reduce the impact of the change quite a lot.

Zulip thread: https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/Near-timeout.20in.20.60mulEnergy_card_filter.60

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/84547c72-b470-4f99-a64f-4baa4c50c6a8) for commit a389cfe221a45063c4543c5bc218fe0cf6e3f4a5.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/32f19fbc-d5d7-4d0c-af1b-996e472c066f/to/84547c72-b470-4f99-a64f-4baa4c50c6a8) against commit 0409a2fdbd4794d366b45ab8ca300170d8901496:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                    Metric         Change
  ==================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Combinatorics.Additive.Energy                       instructions   -77.3%
+ ~Mathlib.Combinatorics.SimpleGraph.Triangle.Counting         instructions   -69.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Data.Finset.Basic                                   instructions   -17.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Data.Finset.Prod                                    instructions   -46.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Data.Nat.Multiplicity                               instructions   -38.4%
+ ~Mathlib.NumberTheory.LegendreSymbol.GaussEisensteinLemmas   instructions   -51.4%
+ ~Mathlib.RingTheory.MvPolynomial.NewtonIdentities            instructions   -32.8%
```
Two of those files are mine ðŸ˜³

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9086599130/job/24972640968)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9086599130/job/24972639935)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9086599130/job/24972640474)
I am *pretty sure* those lemmas already exist. Mind checking?
Indeed these do exist; with different capitalization. Will replace accordingly.

```suggestion
```
It looks like this is solved `by simp`. It would nice to be able to trust the linter.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Data.Finset): un-`@[simp]` `filter_{true,false}_of_mem`
